The bestroute med-confederation command enables BGP to compare the Multi Exit Discriminator (MED) values of routes in a confederation when BGP selects the optimal route.
The undo bestroute med-confederation command restores the default settings. The bestroute med-confederation command enables BGP to compare the Multi Exit Discriminator (MED) values of routes in a confederation when BGP selects the optimal route. The undo bestroute med-confederation command restores the default settings. By default, BGP compares the MED values of only the routes that are learned from peers in the same AS.
ParentView: BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view,BGP view
ExtraInfo: By default, BGP compares the MED values of only the routes that are learned from peers in the same AS (excluding confederation sub-ASs). To enable BGP to compare MED values of routes in a confederation when selecting the optimal route, run the bestroute med-confederation command.
